author: Mubarra 🤍
text: Eid Mubarak 🤍 ! Hope everyone has a blissful Eid and happy moments today that make you smile. God bless!!! #EidMubarak #EidUlFitr

author: Mubarra 🤍
text: IN SHA ALLAH will see you again Ramadan. Alhamdullilah for everything. may we continue the good habits we established and choose good. May Allah SWT accept our rozas, forgive us, grant us good health, bring peace in our hearts, and bless us. Ameen. 🤍!
